Dating: 30TH DYNASTY (not after); LATE PERIOD; 26TH DYNASTY (not before)
Name: Thoth as a baboon
Description: The statue represents a squatting baboon with a lunar disk and crescent set on his head.  The details of the pelt and hair have been engraved, as is a line of inscription which runs along the sides of the base. Both the inscription and the kind of animal represented indicate that the figure is a manifestation of the god Thoth.
